EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-04-06
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Cloud Foundry 1.10 Is Here!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
April 6, 2017 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/always-be-shipping-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry-1-10-go-fast-go-secure-and-go-net]]> Always Be Shipping with Pivotal Cloud Foundry 1.10: Go Fast, Go Secure, and Go .NET! Ship code quickly and safely with Pivotal Cloud Foundry 1.10! The latest release includes distributed tracing, networking tools, native Windows Server, and more. Check It Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/always-be-shipping-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry-1-10-go-fast-go-secure-and-go-net]]> <[[https://architecht.io/pivotal-ceo-rob-mee-on-the-success-of-cloud-foundry-and-learning-to-sell-enterprise-software-78314b67fdde]]> ArchiTECHt Interview with Pivotal CEO Rob MeeÂ Pivotal CEO Rob Mee talks to Derrick Harris on the success of Cloud Foundry and learning to sell enterprise software. Read the Interview <[[https://architecht.io/pivotal-ceo-rob-mee-on-the-success-of-cloud-foundry-and-learning-to-sell-enterprise-software-78314b67fdde]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/8-point-grid-borders-and-layouts-e91eb97f5091]]> 8-Point Grid: Borders and Layouts Elliot Dahl answers all those burning questions you have about converting to an 8-point grid system. Grids, Grids, Grids <[[https://builttoadapt.io/8-point-grid-borders-and-layouts-e91eb97f5091]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/6-ways-pivotal-cloud-foundry-1-10-improves-your-security-posture]]> 6 Ways Pivotal Cloud Foundry 1.10 Improves Your Security Posture How will the new version of Pivotal Cloud Foundry help you develop faster and stay secure? Let us count the ways. Do the Right Thing <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/6-ways-pivotal-cloud-foundry-1-10-improves-your-security-posture]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/can-the-cloud-save-retail-734812aca3e8]]> Can The Cloud Save Retail? The walls appear to be crumbling for traditional retailers, but Yael Grauer thinks the cloud can turn that around. It's Not Over <[[https://builttoadapt.io/can-the-cloud-save-retail-734812aca3e8]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/developer-ready-infrastructure-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry-and-vmware-nsx]]> Developer-Ready Infrastructure with Pivotal Cloud Foundry & VMware NSX Get more from your data center and empower your team with Pivotal Cloud Foundry on VMware NSX. Better Together <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/developer-ready-infrastructure-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry-and-vmware-nsx]]> <[[https://www.infoq.com/presentations/pivotal-pair-programming]]> Further Together: Curated Pairing Culture at Pivotal Software Engineer Neha Batra didn't believe in pair programming... until she worked at Pivotal.
